name: Bitcoin Man
description:
Hector, the super villain has hacked the network nodes that create bitcoins causing the value to drop dramatically. Lucky an elite hacker who goes by the name Bitcoin Man, has infuriated Hectors systems, logging himself in and is collecting back the coins within Hectors computer generated world.

You need to tap the screen to jump and collect the coins, avoiding the many hazards hector sends your way, the faster you tap, the higher Bitcoin man jumps.

Featuring awesome soundtracks, sound effects, hand drawn graphics and addictive gameplay Bitcoin Man is a twist on arcade classics. Can you beat the high score?

With simple responsive controls great for all ages.
